extendedInfo.description: First person survival-horror game "Slender: Hospital" comes to Google Play!The objective is to collect seven pages located in various areas of the hospital while avoiding the slender man. Can you find the hidden pages before slender man gets you?Features:â Randomly generated pages locationsâ HD textures, models and environmentsâ Nice AIâ Terrifying soundsâ Button-less game screenTips:â Play with headphones to fully experience atmospheric audioâ For better control use your fingertips

reviews.title: Very good
reviews.comment: Wow its like the best slender man game in the world i give it a 5
reviews.author: Danilo Fernandez

reviews.title: The game is excellent
reviews.comment: The game is good for slender man gamers and people who like a good scare. Though the controls need some work, overall good game. I give it 5.
reviews.author: michael ferrando

reviews.title: Not bad
reviews.comment: Movement toggles could be vastly improved, however, nice work. Great potential app.
reviews.author: Michael Quiles

reviews.title: Atmospheric
reviews.comment: This game easily has a great atmosphere but is offset by glitchy level and awkward controls. Also please tweak the ai so he appears more often and not always behind you
reviews.author: Reece Williscroft

reviews.title: Needs work.
reviews.comment: I like it, but needs work. The setting is pretty creepy, I mean it\'s a hospital and they are inherently creepy. The sound effects are well done.. But, your guy is just do hard to control at times. It seems to me the walls collision area are set larger than the physical area, because it is easy to get stuck in doorways.
reviews.author: David Carter

reviews.title: Fix the controls
reviews.comment: Controls need fixing bad. Walking is so hard
reviews.author: Nathan Alamillo

reviews.title: Okay
reviews.comment: This game is cool but plzzz fix the controls everytime i try to turn it keeps moving me sideways Lg motion 4g
reviews.author: Chris Woodley

reviews.title: Needs a little work
reviews.comment: The controls are too difficult,it takes way too long to actually move forward & by the time u get it u have to start all over when u find a page ,the controls for \'chapter 1: alone\' are perfect,please fix
reviews.author: Lisa M

reviews.title: Good game
reviews.comment: I like it, but you need to add a flashlight. It\'s a good game. And the controls needs to be fixed.
reviews.author: brittany wilcoxen

reviews.title: Slender hospital
reviews.comment: Has great potential!
reviews.author: Jack Menzl

reviews.title: Please read
reviews.comment: This game is very glitchy very please fix and add static and dying ending please
reviews.author: Charlie LoMonaco

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: The atmosphere of this game is very good it has many different rooms to explore and your always on edge waiting for Slender to pop up. A very good game, I hope more are made.
reviews.author: Louis Hurst

reviews.title: Please read
reviews.comment: I am rating with 5 stars because this app has great potential. The level already looks good, but it is glitchy. One improvement would be a jumpscare sound, and you should have slender follow you rather than just pop up. Also add static effect when you look at him. Please add and this app will be AWESOME.
reviews.author: Joshua Koontz

reviews.title: Frustrating
reviews.comment: Controls are too frustrating and tbh ruin the game in itself because you\'re standing against a wall half the game.
reviews.author: Nick Smithburger

reviews.title: Good game but bad controls
reviews.comment: Needs to have better  controls like joysticks
reviews.author: keondi anderson

reviews.title: Do not buy
reviews.comment: As soon as you get the first page slender is right behind you.
reviews.author: Nate Top

reviews.title: laggy
reviews.comment: cant play really laggy pls. fix :)
reviews.author: Keith Hunter

reviews.title: Read it
reviews.comment: Great
reviews.author: Alex Cable

reviews.title: Good job
reviews.comment: Keep on going
reviews.author: Victor Marincowits

reviews.title: Dgh
reviews.comment: Sick
reviews.author: Jasmine Garcia
